p: The study group was composed by 27 patients, 74% (n = 20) female and 26% (n = 7) male individuals, who exhibited CHIKV symptoms as intense polyarthralgia with impaired walking (n = 27), myalgia (n = 27), headache (n = 27), fever (n = 25), backache (n = 24), exanthema (n = 22), conjunctivitis (n = 17), retro-orbital pain (n = 16), nausea (n = 15) and vomiting (n = 14) ( S1 Table).
